notes: The boot2docker profile appears to be hardcoded to $HOME/.boot2docker
and will contain certs and the boot2docker.iso
Uses scoop git and openssh dependencies instead of packaged msysgit
Run `boot2docker shellinit | Invoke-Expression` in Powershell to
post_install:
# see $dir/start.sh

        echo ""
        echo "Copying boot2docker.iso to default location"
        $ISO = "$HOME/.boot2docker/boot2docker.iso"

        If (-not (Test-Path $ISO)) {
            New-Item -Force -ItemType directory -Path (Split-Path $ISO)
            Copy-Item "$dir/boot2docker.iso" $ISO
        }


        echo "Starting boot2docker test run"
        boot2docker init
        boot2docker start
        boot2docker ip
        boot2docker down
